description: Contract for the supply of firewood to Departments of Parks in BC.
duration_in_months: Heurna and specific details unavailable at this time.
full_summary:
**Tender Call:** Kootenay Firewood

================(
**Category/Registration:** Forestry Resources
)

**Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
**Procedure:** Competitive Open Bidding
**Evaluation Criteria:** Lowest Price
**Project Period:** February 27, 2024 (tender closing date) to March 31, 2025 (contract end date)

**Vendor Registration:**

To participate in the procurement, vendors must have a valid General Services Integrated Information System (GSIN) classification of 70151900, Forestry Resources. Vendors are required to submit their offer via the online tendering system.

**Contracting Authority:**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is the contracting authority for this procurement.

**Contract Delivery Region:**

The contract will be delivered in the province of British Columbia.

**Attachments:**

Please refer to the online tendering system for attachments and documentation.

**Additional Information:**

For more details regarding this tender call, please visit: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18749993?extsite=MTg3NDk5OTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18749993?extsite=MTg3NDk5OTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
Please note that the tender call has expired.

**Closing Time:** February 27, 2024 at 14:00 hours (local time)

**Contractor to Contract End Date:** From **March 1, 2024** until **March 31, 2025** 

**Contract Name:** Parks Canada Agency (PC)

For any other inquiries, please contact: Daphne Yu (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: [daphne.yu@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:daphne.yu@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) 
[tel number not provided]  or  [fax not provided] Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gátineau, Qc. or 30 Victoria Street, Gátineau, Qc., or, the department website.
